name: A NEW CHANCE
description:
A NEW CHANCE is a relaxing real time strategy game, where you are responsible for developing your town in the best way possible. Manage your city and resources, beware of the population welfare!Game developed in a #animaimpactgames Game Jam.

Song Credits:
Relaxing Guitar by Liron Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/7722-relaxing-guitar
